title: Not sure if bug or i got lucky
body: couple of days ago i promo'd into b4 (lucky me :D) but yesterday i played 3 games and  first game gained 18lp, second lost that 18lp, the third game i went positive but we still lost (overly fed liss) and i didn't get demoted, has the lp gain changed or was it because i went positive thus stayed on 0lp b4

replies.body: You usually have to love like 8 I'm pre sure
u can only b demoted if u lose 3 solid games on 0lp. thats what i remember from s3 i think
I'm Bronze 1 and I lost 4 games in a row on 0 points straight after promoting (Went from a 7 game winsteak to a 4 game losestreak ;-;) but yeah I lost 4 on 0 points so. (And didn't demote).
check the league ladder and see how many people are on 0lp which are below you in the ranked, once u hit the bottom and lose again, i am fairly certain you get demoted then
I've lost my last 6 (cringingly checking my match history) on 0lp and are yet to be demoted.

go the the leagues option and check your name on the list of people in b4, when you are 0 there wouldve been a few ppl also on 0 but lower then you on that list, once you get to the bottom then lose you get demoted to b5, im fairly certain that is how it works

its based on MMR...if you are above the rank you are then you wont go down for quite some games.
i lost 9 games on 0 LP in silver 2 last season. didnt drop. then i won 6 in a row and i was in promos for silver 1.
